NIGHT-VISION GOGGLES.Definition: a pair of glasses to allow you to see in the night

HOTSPOT.Definition: a place where something happens frequently

PLUNGED.Definition: quickly fallen into a state (usually a negative state)

NAVY.Definition: the country's armed forces that fight at sea

DISBANDED.Definition: stop existing as a single organisation

FERTILE.Definition: producing a large amount of resources (fish, crops, etc.)

DUMP.Definition: put something in a careless way

OVERBOARD.Definition: over the side of a boat

WARLORDS.Definition: military leaders that control a region

STIRRED UP.Definition: caused to come to the surface

ARMED.Definition: if you arm yourself, you get weapons

RANSOMS.Definition: money that is demanded in exchange for a person or object

CARGO.Definition: goods carried by a ship, aeroplane or vehicle

OIL TANKER.Definition: a large ship that transports oil

LOAN.Definition: an amount of money that is borrowed

STOCK MARKET.Definition: a place where shares in companies are bought

OUTBID.Definition: to offer to pay a higher price

ECO-WARRIORS.Definition: people who care strongly about the environment

GOLDEN AGE.Definition: the best time (for a particular activity, people)

SHORE.Definition: the land along the sea or river

LONG SHOT.Definition: something with a little chance of success
